thread.title: Bowyer lands ride with HScott before replacing Tony Stewart
thread.title_full: Bowyer lands ride with HScott before replacing Tony Stewart

title: Bowyer lands ride with HScott before replacing Tony Stewart
text:
> North Carolina Bowyer lands ride with HScott before replacing Tony Stewart Clint Bowyer, left, speaks during a press conference in where it was announced he will race for HScott Motorsports for the 2016 season, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, at Dover International Speedway in Dover, Del. At right is Harry Scott Jr., owner of HScott Motorsports. The NASCAR Sprint Cup series auto race is scheduled for Sunday. (AP Photo/Nick Wass)
